content.raw:
The walkway models' textures are not showing. For the 45 and 90 degree ones, it could be because they're [pointing to the straight](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/src/73f89ecb1622f0bce7f9da3827958c40e62fb83f/walkway_metal_90/meshes/mesh.mtl?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) one's material? But I don't understand why the straight one doesn't work either.

gzweb / gzclient

content.html:
The walkway models' textures are not showing. For the 45 and 90 degree ones, it could be because they're pointing to the straight one's material? But I don't understand why the straight one doesn't work either.
